407440:
Take me to your favorite spark,
and show me that you have never been watched.
By the hawk that hunts the walking.
By the wind that takes the talking.
By the sky that sees you come and need you every day.

Leave me in the black backyard,
and show me all your favorite stars.
It's the sun that chases after
all the wind, and wings and feathers,
and the sky that sees you come and need you every day.

In the night, the sun is far away.
Black and grey, grey and blue.
...
